price: 9. Waxaanu ka soo dejinnaa daruuraha biyo (roob) barakaysan, oo aan ku soo saarnaa beero iyo baad.
arabic: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wanazzalnā mina al-samāi māan mubārakan fa-anbatnā bihi jannātin waḥabba al-ḥaṣīdi
